Monash Science Symposium (MSS)

Symbiosis: Exploring Extraordinary Possibilities

Mini Science Series

Because of the COVID-19 pandemic, we unfortunately had to cancel the symposium we had planned for 2021. In lieu of the symposium, we decided to conduct a the Mini Science Series, a series of webinars that were held over Zoom. Below are the posters for the three webinars we conducted:

    Pandemic Preparedness: Challenges Faced and Lessons Learnt
    Am I OK? Adapting to the New Norm During a Pandemic
    Digital Health: A Step Towards Modernized Healthcare
